name: replace-env
description: Replaces Env in a file using pipeline variables
author: Aswinth
helpMarkDown: Replaces text like __VAR__ with pipeline variable values

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file where Env variables should be replaced

inputs.name: placeholderDelimiter
inputs.label: Placeholder Delimiter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique string used to wrap variable names (e.g. __VAR__)
